@template access

{{html:
<div class="account-container stacked">
    <div class="content clearfix padding">

            <h1>Sign In</h1>

            <div class="login-fields">

                <p>Sign in using your registered account:</p>
                <div class="alert alert-error ng-hide" ng-show="loginResult.error">Please enter the correct username & password.</div>
                <div class="field">
                    <label for="username">Username:</label>
                    <input type="text" id="username" name="username" value="" placeholder="Username" class="login username-field" ng-model="username" />
                </div>

                <div class="field">
                    <label for="password">Password:</label>
                    <input type="password" id="password" name="password" value="" placeholder="Password" class="login password-field" ng-model="password"/>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="login-actions">
                <input type="submit" ng-click="login()" class="button btn  btn-primary btn-large" value="Login" />
            </div>
			<p class="sp"><span>Or</span></p> <hr>
			<a class="btn long-btn">Sign Up</a>
    </div>
</div>
}}
